creator: StriveWin
descriptionHtml:
Picture Quotes and creator app helps you to create your own quotes with a beautiful background images, colors or your image as background.

✪ Picture Quotes and Creator contains more than 110 Quotes Categories like
✔ Adventure Quotes
✔ Age Quotes
✔ Alone Quotes
✔ Amazing Quotes
✔ Anger Quotes
✔ Anniversary Quotes
✔ Architecture Quotes
✔ Art Quotes
✔ Attitude Quotes
✔ Beautiful Quotes
✔ Beauty Quotes
✔ Birthday Quotes
✔ Buddha Sayings
✔ Business Quotes
✔ Car Topic Quotes
✔ Change Related Quotes
✔ Communication Quotes
✔ Compare Topic Quotes
✔ Cool Quotes
✔ Courage Quotes
✔ Daily Quotes
✔ Dating Quotes
✔ Death Quotes
✔ Design Quotes
✔ Dreams Quotes
✔ Easter Quotes
✔ Education Quotes
✔ Fashion Quotes
✔ Freedom Quotes
✔ Funny Quotes
✔ Gratitude Quotes
✔ Hope Quotes
✔ Inevitable Quotes
✔ Inspirational Quotes
✔ Intelligence Quotes
✔ Kindness Quotes
✔ Knowledge Quotes
✔ Leadership Quotes
✔ Life Quotes
✔ Love Quotes
✔ Music Quotes
✔ Nature Quotes
✔ Positive Quotes
✔ Romantic Quotes
✔ Sad Quotes
✔ Smile Quotes
✔ Sports Quotes
✔ Strength Quotes
✔ Success Quotes
✔ Saying Quotes
✔ Teacher Quotes
✔ Technology Quotes

Our quote collections are organized by categories to help you find the perfect quote. You can easily modify any quotes or create your own quotes by changing background, different types of fonts, colors etc.

Quotes Creator can allow you to modify existing quote or create your own code in following way,
✔ Change Quotes Background Image (1800+ Background Images available)
✔ User your own image as a quote background
✔ Choose photo from gallery
✔ Set different color background
✔ Set Gradient color background
✔ Add different color overlay to background image
✔ Blur Background Images / Apply Different image filters
✔ Change Quote Text Style, Text Color, Text Size, Text Shadow
✔ Add Emoji stickers over the quotes
✔ More than 35 different font styles available

You can save quotes to your phone and easily access them later without internet. Share Text Quotes or Picture Quotes with your friends in single click.

✪ App Features ✪
✔ One of the largest collection of Text Quotes and Picture Quotes
✔ Easy to use (Simple UI)
✔ List of Text Quotes (Easy to copy and share)
✔ Picture Quotes (With different backgrounds and fonts styles, colors)
✔ Create new quote
✔ Modify/ Edit Text Quotes or Picture Quotes
✔ Add quotes to favorites and access them easily for later use.
✔ Faster Loading
✔ Compatible with 99% android devices
✔ Totally free to use

Copyright Disclaimer
All images are copyright of their respective owners. All background images in the app are available from Pixabay. This image is not endorsed by any of the respective owners, and the images are used only for informative purpose. In case if you have any issues regarding your intellectual information found on our application, kindly shoot an email on strivewinapps@gmail.com with content ownership information and we will get back to you.

descriptionShort: Create beautiful quotes using Picture Quotes and Creator app.
title: Picture Quotes and Creator

creator: StriveWin
descriptionHtml:
Picture Quotes and Creator: Craft Inspiring Quotes with Stunning Backgrounds

Easily create your own quotes with the Picture Quotes and Creator app. Choose from a variety of beautiful background images, vibrant colors, or use your own images as backgrounds.

Picture Quotes and Creator simplifies the process of crafting and sharing your unique quotes. Personalize every detail, from background colors to text size and fonts. Express your creativity, share your inspiring quotes with friends, and make a statement with Quotes Creator!

✪ Explore a Wide Range of Quotes in Picture Quotes and Creator App!
Discover over 110 Quote Categories, including:
✔ Adventure Quotes
✔ Age Quotes
✔ Alone Quotes
✔ Amazing Quotes

✔ Smile Quotes
✔ Sports Quotes
✔ Strength Quotes
✔ Success Quotes
✔ Saying Quotes
✔ Teacher Quotes
✔ Technology Quotes

Explore a vast collection of quotes meticulously organized into various categories for easy discovery. With Quotes Creator, you have the power to customize existing quotes or craft your unique expressions by adjusting backgrounds, fonts, colors, and more.

Unlock Your Creativity with Quotes Creator:
✔ Choose from 1800+ Background Images
✔ Use Your Own Photos as Quote Backgrounds
✔ Select Images from Your Gallery
✔ Set Vibrant Color Backgrounds
✔ Apply Gradient Color Backgrounds
✔ Add Color Overlays to Background Images
✔ Blur Backgrounds and Apply Unique Filters
✔ Customize Quote Text Style, Color, Size, and Shadow
✔ Enhance Quotes with Emoji Stickers
✔ Access a Variety of Font Styles (Over 35 Options)

Save your creations offline for easy access and share them effortlessly with friends via Text Quotes or Picture Quotes.

✪ App Highlights: ✪
✔ Extensive Collection of Text and Picture Quotes
✔ User-Friendly Interface (Simple UI)
✔ Text Quotes List (Easy to Copy and Share)
✔ Picture Quotes with Diverse Backgrounds and Fonts
✔ Create New Quotes or Edit Existing Ones
✔ Favorite Quotes for Quick Access
✔ Swift Loading
✔ Compatible with 99% of Android Devices
✔ Completely Free to Use

Express yourself uniquely and inspire others with Quotes Creator – the ultimate tool for crafting and sharing your thoughts!

All images used in this application are the copyright of their respective owners. The background images sourced from Pixabay are available in the public domain. This application is not endorsed by any of the respective owners, and the images are used solely for informative purposes. If you have concerns regarding your intellectual property found within our application, please send an email to strivewinapps@gmail.com with content ownership information, and we will promptly address the matter.
descriptionShort: Create inspirational, motivational quotes with name on photo from Quotes Creator
title:
Picture Quotes and Creator
1.24

creator: StriveWin
descriptionHtml:
Picture Quotes Creator: All in One Daily Quote Creator app to create Inspirational Quotes with Stunning Backgrounds

Elevate your creativity with Picture Quotes Creator app to create and share unique quotes effortlessly with a variety of beautiful backgrounds, vibrant colors, and the option to use your own images as a background of quotes.

Picture Quotes and Creator simplifies designing and sharing your personalized quotes across the community. Customize every detail, from background colors to text size and fonts. Share your creativity with friends and make a statement with this powerful Quotes Creator app!

🔓 Features of this Quotes Creator or Quote Writing app
• More than 110 Quotes Categories
• Choose from 3000+ Background Images
• 110+ Creative Fonts to choose from
• Use Your Own Photos as Quote Backgrounds
• Select Images from Your Gallery
• Set Vibrant Solid Color Backgrounds
• Apply Gradient Color Backgrounds
• Add Color Overlays to Background Images (Dark/Light)
• Apply Unique Filter Effects
• Customize Quote Text Style, Color, Size, and Shadow
• Enhance Quotes with Emoji Stickers
• Easily save and share your creations on social media or Add it to Post Timeline in Picture Quotes app

Save your creations offline for easy access and share them effortlessly with friends via Text Quotes or Picture Quotes.

💥 App Highlights
• Collection of 75000+ Text and Picture Quotes
• User-Friendly Interface (Simple to use)
• Quotes from Worldwide Authors (Easy to Edit, Download, Copy, and Share)
• Picture Quotes with Beautiful Backgrounds and Fonts
• Create Your Own Quotes with Photos
• Post Timeline: Post your creation or share your quotes with others
• Add Quotes to Favorite (Access them anytime easily)
• Faster Loading

🔍 Search Quotes and Popular Quotes
Effortlessly find the perfect text or picture quotes using our advanced Search Quotes feature. Stay updated with trending quotes in Popular Quotes and explore the most liked categories right on the HomeScreen of the app. Make your quotes stand out and share your wisdom with the world!

🤩 Create, Upload, and Share Quotes
Create stunning quotes directly in the app from beautiful backgrounds or upload from your gallery. Easily share your Picture Quotes on social media or post them to the Post Timeline to inspire others. Engage with our community by exploring the Post Timeline, where users share their created quotes get Likes and make it as one of the Popular Quotes. Upload your quotes, get inspired, and connect with others in our growing community.

🌟 Enhanced Features for Users
• Create an Account to Post Quotes to the Timeline: To share your quotes with the community, create an account and enjoy additional benefits.
• Access Favorite Quotes and Saved Posts Easily from Your Account: Keep track of your favorite quotes and saved posts effortlessly even after re-installing the app.
• Large Collection of Auto-Designed Quotes: Explore a vast collection of quotes with beautifully designed fonts and background images.
• Effortless Quote Creator: Create quote with images easily and share them on social media with just a few taps.

📈 Explore a Wide Range of Quotes in Picture Quotes and Creator App!
Discover over 110+ Quote Categories, including some popular quotes categories like below:

• Inspirational Quotes
• Motivational Quotes
• Love Quotes
• Friendship Quotes
• Happiness Quotes
• Life Quotes
• Positive Quotes
• Success Quotes
• Wisdom Quotes

Download Picture Quotes Creator app now and start making your quotes today! You can also visit https://www.picturequotes.app
descriptionShort: Picture Quotes Creator is ultimate Quote Maker with Photo and Quotes Writing app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Major Update
- Search Quotes: Effortlessly find the perfect text or picture quotes using our advanced Search Quotes feature.
- Search Quotes from Famous Authors.
- Become an author : Create your own quote and submit to app.
- Bug fixes and Improvements.
